text: 808s and Heartbreak is the fourth studio album by American rapper and producer Kanye West. It was released on November 24, 2008.Kanye West - 808s & Heartbreak - Amazon.com Music Four singles were released from it. The first single was "Love Lockdown". The album is different to West's earlier albums; it is mainly a hip hop, electronica and R&B; album instead of a more "traditional hip hop album" and its songs are sung through an Auto-Tune processor instead of rapped. == Track listing == == Personnel == Credits for 808s & Heartbreak adapted from AllMusic. * Kanye West – producer, executive producer, primary artist * Kid Cudi – primary artist * Lil Wayne – primary artist * Mr. Hudson – primary artist * Young Jeezy – primary artist * Kevin Dorley – vocals * Jim Gilstrap – vocals * Phillip Ingram – vocals * Glenn Jordan – vocals * Kadockadee Kwire – vocals * Jenny-Bea Englishman – vocals * Tony Williams – backing vocals * Olga Konopelsky – violins * Emma Kummrow – violins * Luca Mazzochi – violins * Charles Parker – violins * Igor Szwec – violins * Gregory Teperman – violins * Davis A. Barnett – viola * Alexandra Leem – viola * Jeff Bhasker – keyboards * Vlado Meller – mastering * Jeff Chestek – engineer * Andrew Dawson – engineer * Anthony Kilhoffer – engineer * Rick Friedric – assistant engineer * Montez Roberts – assistant engineer * John Stahl – assistant engineer * Alan Branch – marketing * Chris Atlas – marketing * Don-C – marketing * Danny Clinch – marketing * Willy Vanderperre – marketing * Kris Yiengst – artwork * Brian Donnelly – deluxe edition artwork * Virgil Abloh – art direction * Larry Gold – string Arrangements, string Conductor * James J.
